channel.title: spectre/meltdown mitigation on whonix
channel.description:
What would be the recommended way of upgrading the kernel to a version that comes with spectre/meltdown mitigation?
"sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrade" does not upgrade to a kernel that includes mitigations.
